verses.verse: ' And <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1565><s%> At That <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Put Forth <S%G1911><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King His <S%G935><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> To Ill Treat <S%G2559><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly; <S%G1577><s%>
<S%G337><s%> And He Put To Death <S%G1161><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Of John <S%G2491><s%> With A Sword. <S%G3162><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Pleasing <S%G701><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> He Added <S%G4369><s%> To Take <S%G4815><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Peter : <S%G4074><s%> and They <S%G2258><s%> Were <S%G1161><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Of Unleavened <S%G3588><s%> Bread : <S%G106><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Having Seized <S%G4084><s%> He Put <S%G5087><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Prison, <S%G5438><s%> Having Delivered <S%G3860><s%> To Four <S%G5064><s%> Sets Of Four <S%G5069><s%> Soldiers <S%G4757><s%> To Guard <S%G5442><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Purposing <S%G1014><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover <S%G3957><s%> To Bring Out <S%G321><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> People. <S%G2992><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Therefore <S%G3303><s%> Indeed <S%G3767><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Was Kept <S%G5083><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prison; <S%G5438><s%> <S%G4335><s%> But Prayer <S%G1161><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Fervent <S%G1618><s%> Made <S%G1096><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Concerning <S%G5228><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3753><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> Was About <S%G3195><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Bring Forth <S%G4254><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%> In <S%G3588><s%> That <S%G3571><s%> Night <S%G1565><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Sleeping <S%G2837><s%> Between <S%G3342><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Soldiers, <S%G4757><s%> Bound <S%G1210><s%> With Chains <S%G254><s%> Two, <S%G1417><s%> Guards <S%G5441><s%> Also <S%G5037><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Door <S%G2374><s%> Kept <S%G5083><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prison. <S%G5438><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> An Angel <S%G32><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Stood By, <S%G2186><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Light <S%G5457><s%> Shone <S%G2989><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Building. <S%G3612><s%> <S%G3960><s%> And Having Smitten <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Side <S%G4125><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Roused Up <S%G1453><s%> He Him, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Rise Up <S%G450><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Haste. <S%G5034><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fell Off <S%G1601><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chains <S%G254><s%> From His <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands. <S%G5495><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G5037><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Gird Thyself About. <S%G4024><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bind On <S%G5265><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4547><s%> Thy Sandals. <S%G4675><s%> He Did <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> So, <S%G3779><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Cast About <S%G4016><s%> Thee <S%G3588><s%> Garment, <S%G2440><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Going Forth <S%G1831><s%> He Followed <S%G190><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Did Not <S%G3756><s%> Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Real <S%G227><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Is Happening <S%G1096><s%> By Means <S%G1223><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Angel, <S%G32><s%> <S%G1380><s%> But Thought <S%G1161><s%> A Vision <S%G3705><s%> He Saw. <S%G991><s%>

<S%G1330><s%> And Having Passed Though <S%G1161><s%> A First <S%G4413><s%> Guard <S%G5438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Second, <S%G1208><s%> They Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gate <S%G4439><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Iron <S%G4603><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Leads <S%G5342><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Of Itself <S%G844><s%> Opened <S%G455><s%> To Them; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> They Went On Through <S%G4281><s%> Street <S%G4505><s%> <S%G1520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Departed <S%G868><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Having Come <S%G1096><s%> To <S%G1722><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> I Know <S%G1492><s%> Of A Truth <S%G230><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Sent Forth <S%G1821><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Angel, <S%G32><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Delivered <S%G1807><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> Of Herod <S%G2264><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Expectation <S%G4329><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews. <S%G2453><s%>

<S%G4894><s%> And Considering It <S%G5037><s%> He Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Of Mary <S%G3137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mother <S%G3384><s%> Of John <S%G2491><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Mark, <S%G3138><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Many <S%G2425><s%> Gathered Together <S%G4867><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Praying. <S%G4336><s%>

<S%G2925><s%> And Having Knocked <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> At The <S%G3588><s%> Door <S%G2374><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Porch, <S%G4440><s%> Came <S%G4334><s%> A Damsel <S%G3814><s%> To Listen, <S%G5219><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Rhoda; <S%G4498><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Recognized <S%G1921><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Peter, <S%G4074><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> She <S%G3756><s%> Opened Not <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Porch, <S%G4440><s%> Having Run In <S%G1532><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> She Reported <S%G518><s%> To Be Standing <S%G2476><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Porch. <S%G4440><s%>

But <S%G3588><s%> They <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> Thou Art Mad. <S%G3105><s%> But <S%G3588><s%> She <S%G1161><s%> Strongly Affirmed <S%G1340><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> It Was. <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> ' And They <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> It Is. <S%G2076><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Continued <S%G1961><s%> Knocking : <S%G2925><s%> <S%G455><s%> And Having Opened <S%G1161><s%> They Saw <S%G1492><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Amazed. <S%G1839><s%>

<S%G2678><s%> And Having Made A Sign <S%G1161><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> To Be Silent <S%G4601><s%> He Related <S%G1334><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Brought <S%G1806><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prison. <S%G5438><s%> <S%G2036><s%> And He Said, <S%G1161><s%> Report <S%G518><s%> To James <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> These Things. <S%G5023><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> He Went <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Another <S%G2087><s%> Place. <S%G5117><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And Having Come <S%G1161><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> There Was <S%G2258><s%> Disturbance <S%G5017><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Small <S%G3641><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Soldiers, <S%G4757><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Then Of <S%G687><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Was Become. <S%G1096><s%>

Herod <S%G2264><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Having Sought After <S%G1934><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having Found, <S%G2147><s%> Having Examined <S%G350><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Guards <S%G5441><s%> He Commanded Them <S%G2753><s%> To Be Led Away To Death <S%G520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Down <S%G2718><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> He Stayed There. <S%G1304><s%>

Was <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> In Bitter Hostility <S%G2371><s%> With The Tyrians <S%G5183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sidonians; <S%G4606><s%> <S%G3661><s%> But With One Accord <S%G1161><s%> They Came <S%G3918><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gained <S%G3982><s%> Blastus <S%G986><s%> Who Was <S%G3588><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bedchamber <S%G2846><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> King, <S%G935><s%> Sought <S%G154><s%> Peace, <S%G1515><s%> Because <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Was Nourished <S%G5142><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Country <S%G5561><s%> By <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King's. <S%G937><s%>

<S%G5002><s%> And On A Set <S%G1161><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> Having Put On <S%G1746><s%> Apparel <S%G2066><s%> Royal, <S%G937><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Sat <S%G2523><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tribunal, <S%G968><s%> Was Making An Oration <S%G1215><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> People <S%G1218><s%> Were Crying Out, <S%G2019><s%> Of A God The <S%G2316><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Of A Man! <S%G444><s%>

<S%G3916><s%> And Immediately <S%G1161><s%> Smote <S%G3960><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> An Angel <S%G32><s%> Of The Lord, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G473><s%> Because <S%G3739><s%> He <S%G3756><s%> Gave Not <S%G1325><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Been <S%G1096><s%> Eaten Of Worms <S%G4662><s%> He Expired. <S%G1634><s%>
But <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Grew <S%G837><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Multiplied. <S%G4129><s%>

<S%G921><s%> And Barnabas <S%G1161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saul <S%G4569><s%> Returned <S%G5290><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Having Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ministration, <S%G1248><s%> Having Taken With <S%G4838><s%> Them Also <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Was Surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Mark. <S%G3138><s%>
